sentence: there is two boys and one girl.
the first boy is leaning on crutches and is saying something to the second boy.
the second boy has a book in his hand and is smiling.
the girl has a bookbag slung over one shoulder and is also smiling.
the boy on the crutches has a boot on his foot.
the boy is looking down at his boot.
there is a room behind the kids that says room 02.
the girl is looking at the boy.
